item.title: Claude GitHub Action Workflow
item.description: This diagram illustrates how the Claude GitHub Action workflow processes issue comments and updates diagrams in the repository. flowchart TD A[User creates issue comment with @claude] --> B{Comment contains @claude?} B -->|No| C[Action ignored] B -->|Yes| D[GitHub Action triggered] D --> E[Extract comment content] E --> F[Send request to Claude API] F --> G{Claude generates response} G -->|Diagram update request| H[Claude modifies SVG files] G -->|Code changes| I[Claude updates code files] G -->|Information only| J[Claude posts comment reply] H --> K[Create new branch] I --> K K --> L[Commit changes] L --> M[Create pull request] M --> N[Post PR link as comment] J --> O[End workflow] N --> O subgraph "
